pullrequest.title: fixed the zipping issue, and added to the integration test

content.raw: The test now includes launching a CloudSim stable from CloudSim, and performing an update of the software. This should prevent any further issues related to the difference between "launching CloudSim from CloudSim" vs "launching CloudSim with create_cloudsim.py"
content.html: The test now includes launching a CloudSim stable from CloudSim, and performing an update of the software. This should prevent any further issues related to the difference between "launching CloudSim from CloudSim" vs "launching CloudSim with create_cloudsim.py"
